nodes.text: Starhunter's Intergalactic Menagerie was a traveling circus and rarity show, owned by Captain Stroon and his assistant, Slarm.

They specialized in capturing rare specimens of creatures and also intelligent lifeforms, such as the humanoid Greej (who they would sell as "pets" to aliens in distant parts of the galaxy), and transporting them aboard a Starhunter menagerie ark. They sometimes made a supply stop at Chuzalla. Jann Tosh put them of out business after they had captured Ingey, the pet of Coby.
